headline: WeRide and Uber Launch Middle East’s First Fully Driverless Robotaxi Commercial Operations in Abu Dhabi, UAE
summary: ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates, November 26, 2025--WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD, HKEX: 0800.HK), a global leader in autonomous driving technology, and Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) today announced the launch of Level 4 fully driverless Robotaxi commercial operations in Abu Dhabi. This marks the first driverless deployment in the Middle East, as well as the first city outside the United States to host fully driverless operations on the Uber platform. The launch was supported by the world’s first c

headline: Will Uber’s (UBER) Abu Dhabi Robotaxi Launch Redefine Its Edge in Autonomous Mobility?
summary: Uber Technologies and WeRide recently launched fully driverless Level 4 Robotaxi commercial operations in Abu Dhabi, marking the Middle East's first such deployment and Uber's inaugural operation of this kind outside the U.S., supported by Abu Dhabi's first city-level autonomous taxi permit. This milestone highlights Uber's rapid progress in scaling autonomous mobility and delivery technologies across new international markets, reinforcing its ambition to lead in next-generation...

This milestone highlights Uber's rapid progress in scaling autonomous mobility and delivery technologies across new international markets, reinforcing its ambition to lead in next-generation...

headline: SoftBank buys another chipmaker, Uber's robotaxi expansion, and China's AI: Trending stocks
summary: OpenAI investor SoftBank (9984.T) acquires Ampere computing. Uber (UBER) teams up with WeRide (WRD) to launch robotaxis in Abu Dhabi. China's Alibaba (BABA, 9988.HK) touts 10 million downloads in one week for its AI app Qwen. Iphone maker Foxconn (2354.TW) gets a greenlight to invest in its Wisconsin facility. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.
